STFU from the President on down!
IF your words doesn't start with ...
"On behalf of the 2 guardsmen fighting for their lives right now we are taking the following action. 
We are mobilizing the military and all government agencies, all hands on deck, to begin the immediate arrest of EVERY NON AMERICAN for immediate DEPORTATION." 
IF you can't say those words....
STFU!!!
 You complicit POS.

posts.raw_content: My sister and I are staying with my mother Today during thanksgiving. She fell and broke her tibia on one leg and the ankle on the other. Due to copd and high carbon dioxide levels had to go onto a ventilator to get that down because nothing else was working to get her stable before leg surgery. She is doing better but still prayers from the lords family are always truly welcome.

posts.raw_content:
Remove Constitutional protections from anyone who's not a citizen.

Make it a 5year minimum mandatory sentence for knowingly hiring an illegal or being an illegal working in the US.

Make companies forfeit any properties where illegals are found to be working.

Set in place a citizen tribunal in every town to investigate businesses employing illegals and give them the power with federal backing to close those businesses. 

Remove all foreign language forms from state and local offices unless for Visa applications. 

Make it a mandatory death sentence for any politician using his position for monetary gain. 

Repeal the 19th
